name: Gateway for Wallet One and Easy Digital Downloads
author: WacoMart

sections.description:
This plugin adds the Wallet One payment gateway for the Easy Digital Downloads digital product plugin. Wallet One is a convenient payment service. Electronic payment service for quick payment for services and making international transfers among users’ wallets.

Securely accept payments with Wallet One

The customer is redirected from your EDD enabled website to a customizable payment form on the Wallet One Gateway’s secure servers. After payment, the client is redirected back to your site.

Features

  • Hash calculation algorithm MD5
  • Work in test mode
  • Setup payment name label
  • FZ-54
  • Available currencies: Russian rubles, US dollars, euros, Ukrainian hryvnia, South African rand, Kazakhstani tenge, Belorussian rubles, Tajik somoni, Polish zloty
  • Instant notification
  • Selecting the interface language (rus, eng)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the ‘gateway-for-wallet-one-and-easy-digital-downloads’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Downloads > Settings and configure the options

Translations

If you wish to check available translations or help with plugin translation to your language visit this link
https://translate.wordpress.org/projects/wp-plugins/gateway-for-wallet-one-and-easy-digital-downloads/
